verses.translation: O All-generous! O All-generous! O All-generous!
verses.transliteration: YA KARIMU YA KARIMU YA KARIMU

verses.translation: By Your mercy, O Most Merciful of the merciful!
May Allah bless the best of His creatures,
Muhammad, and his entire Household!
In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O Allah, verily I beseech You by Your Name:
In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O Lord of majesty and honor!
O Ever-living! O Self-subsistent!

verses.text: يَا حَيُّ لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ انتَ
verses.translation: O Ever-Living! There is no god but You!
verses.transliteration: YA HAYYU LA ILAHA ILLA ANTA

verses.text: يَا هُوَ يَا مَنْ لاَ يَعْلَمُ مَا هُوَ
verses.translation: O He Whom none knows what He is,
verses.transliteration: YA HUWA YA MAN LA YA`LAMU MA HUWA

verses.translation: nor how He is,
nor where He is,
nor in what respect He is, but He!
verses.transliteration: WA LA HAYTHU HUWA ILLA HUWA

verses.translation: O Possessor of dominion and kingdom!
O Possessor of might and invincibility!

verses.text: يَا مَلِكُ يَا قُدُّوسُ يَا سَلاَمُ
verses.translation: O King! O All-holy! O Giver of peace!
verses.transliteration: YA MALIKU YA QUDDUSU YA SALAMU

verses.translation: O Granter of security! O All-preserver!

verses.text: يَا عَزِيزُ يَا جَبَّارُ يَا مُتَكَبِّرُ
verses.translation: O Almighty! O All-compeller! O All-sublime!

verses.text: يَا خَاِلقُ يَا بَارِئُ يَا مُصَوِّرُ
verses.translation: O Creator! O Maker! O Shaper!
O grantor of Benefits! O Director!
O Severe (in punishing the evildoers)! O Originator!
O Returner! O Destroyer!

verses.text: يَا وَدُودُ يَا مَحْمُودُ يَا مَعْبُودُ
verses.translation: O All-loving! O All-praiseworthy! O All-worshipped!
verses.transliteration: YA WADUDU YA MAHMUDU YA MA`BUDU

verses.translation: O Far! O Nigh!

verses.text: يَا مُجِيبُ يَا رَقِيبُ يَا حَسِيبُ
verses.translation: O Responder! O Watcher! O Reckoner!
O Innovator! O Exalter!
O Inaccessible! O All-hearing!

verses.text: يَا عَلِيمُ يَا حَلِيمُ يَا كَرِيمُ
verses.translation: O All-knowing! O All-clement! O All-generous!
O All-wise! O Eternal!
O All-high! O All-tremendous!
O All-commiserating! O All-gracious!
O Condemner! O Recourse!
O All-majestic! O All-handsome!
O Guardian! O Surety!
O Annuller! O Bestower!
O All-noble! O Leader!
O Guide! O All-Apparent!
O First! O Last!
O Outward! O Inward!
O All-steadfast! O Everlasting!
O Knower! O Decider!
O Judge! O Just!
O Separator! O Joiner!
O Pure! O Purifier!
O All-powerful! O All-able!
O All-great! O All-sublime!

verses.text: يَا وَاحِدُ يَا احَدُ يَا صَمَدُ
verses.translation: O One! O Unique! O eternally Besought of all!
verses.transliteration: YA WAHIDU YA AHADU YA SAMADU

verses.text: يَا مَنْ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: O He Who begets not and was not begotten,
verses.transliteration: YA MAN LAM YALID WA LAM YULAD

verses.translation: equal to Whom is none,
verses.transliteration: WA LAM YAKUN LAHU KUFWAN AHADUN

verses.translation: Who has no consort,
with Him is no aide
nor has He taken any adviser,
nor needs He any assistant,

verses.text: وَلاَ كَانَ مَعَهُ مِنَ إِلٰهٍ غَيْرُهُ
verses.translation: nor with Him is any god but He—
verses.transliteration: WA LA KANA MA`AHU MIN ILAHIN GHAYRUHU

verses.translation: there is no god but You.

verses.text: فَتَعَالَيْتَ عَمَّا يَقُولُ ٱلظَّالِمُونَ عُلُوّاً كَبِيراً
verses.translation: So exalted are You above what the evildoers say, a great exaltation!

verses.text: يَا عَلِيُّ يَا شَامِخُ يَا بَاِذخُ
verses.translation: O All-high! O All-lofty! O All-towering!

verses.text: يَا فَتَّاحُ يَا نَفَّاحُ يَا مُرْتَاحُ
verses.translation: O All-opener! O All-diffuser! O All-restful!
verses.transliteration: YA FATTAHU YA NAFFAHU YA MURTAHU

verses.text: يَا مُفَرِّجُ يَا نَاصِرُ يَا مُنْتَصِرُ
verses.translation: O Bestower of relief! O Helper! O Giver of victory!
verses.transliteration: YA MUFARRIJU YA NASIRU YA MUNTASIRU

verses.text: يَا مُدْرِكُ يَا مُهْلِكُ يَا مُنْتَقِمُ
verses.translation: O Comprehender! O Destroyer! O Avenger!
verses.transliteration: YA MUDRIKU YA MUHLIKU YA MUNTAQIMU

verses.translation: O Upraiser! O Inheritor!
O Seeker! O Vanquisher!
O He from Whom no fugitive can escape!

verses.text: يَا تَوَّابُ يَا اوَّابُ يَا وَهَّابُ
verses.translation: O All-relenting! O All-forbearing! O All-bestower!
verses.transliteration: YA TAWWABU YA AWWABU YA WAHHABU

verses.translation: O Originator of all means!
O Opener of all doors!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ حَيْثُ مَا دُعِي اجَابَ
verses.translation: O He Who answers wherever He is called upon!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN HAYTHU MA DU`IYA AJABA

verses.translation: O All-Pure! O All-thankful!
O Exempter! O Forgiver!
O Light of light!
O Director of all affairs!
O All-subtle! O All-aware!
O Protector! O Illuminator!

verses.text: يَا بَصِيرُ يَا ظَهِيرُ يَا كَبِيرُ
verses.translation: O All-seeing! O All-aiding! O All-great!
verses.transliteration: YA BASIRU YA ZAHIRU YA KABIRU

verses.translation: O Alone! O Solitary!

verses.text: يَا ابَدُ يَا سَنَدُ يَا صَمَدُ
verses.translation: O Eternity without end! O Support! O Everlasting Refuge!
verses.transliteration: YA ABADU YA SANADU YA SAMADU

verses.translation: O All-sufficient! O All-healing!
O All-fulfilling! O All-relieving!
O All-kind! O All-gracious!
O All-benevolent! O All-bountiful!
O All-beneficent! O All-solitary!
O He Who is exalted and dominates!
O He Who is master and exercises power!
O He Who is inward and aware!
O He Who is worshipped and thankful!
O He Who is disobeyed and forgives!
O He Who is not encompassed by thoughts,
nor perceived by vision,
and from Whom no trace remains hidden!
O Provider of mankind!
O Determiner of every lot!
O Lofty in place!
O Firm in supports!
O Transformer of times!
O Accepter of sacrifices!
O Lord of graciousness and benevolence!
O Lord of might and force!
O All-compassionate! O All-merciful!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ هُوَ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ فِي شَانٍ
verses.translation: O He Who is every day upon some labor!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN HUWA KULLA YAWMIN FI SHA'NIN

verses.text: يَا مَنْ لاَ يَشْغَلُهُ شَانٌ عَنْ شَانٍ
verses.translation: O He Who is not distracted from one labor by another!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN LA YASHGHALUHU SHA'NUN `AN SHA'NIN

verses.translation: O Tremendous in rank!
O He Who is in every place!
O He Who hears all sounds!
O He Who answers all supplications!
O He Who fulfils all entreaties!
O He Who provides all needs!
O He Who sends down blessings!
O He Who has mercy upon tears!
O He Who annuls slips!
O He Who removes troubles!
O He Who sponsors good things!
O He Who exalts in rank!
O He Who bestows requests!
O He Who gives life to the dead!
O He Who gathers all scattered things!
O He Who is aware of all intentions!
O He Who brings back what has passed away!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ لاَ تَشْتَبِهُ عَلَيْهِ ٱلاصْوَاتُ
verses.translation: O He for Whom sounds are never indistinct!
O He Who never becomes annoyed at requests
nor covered by shadows!
O Light of the earth and the heavens!
O Ample in blessings!
O Repeller of adversities!
O Maker of the breaths of life!
O He Who gathers together the nations!
O Healer of illnesses!
O Creator of light and darkness!
O Lord of munificence and generosity!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ لاَ يَطَا عَرْشَهُ قَدَمٌ
verses.translation: O He upon Whose Throne no foot treads!
O Most Munificent of the most munificent!
O Most Generous of the most generous!
O Most Hearing of the hearers!
O Most Seeing of the viewers!
O Protector of those who seek protection!
O Sanctuary of the fearful!
O Asylum of the refugees!
O Patron of the believers!
O Helper of those who seek aid!
O Goal of the seekers!
O Companion of every stranger!
O Intimate of everyone alone!
O Refuge of every outcast!
O Shelter of every wanderer!
O Custodian of everyone astray!
O He Who is merciful to old men!
O He Who provides for small infants!
O He Who sets broken bones!
O He Who releases every prisoner!
O He Who enriches the miserable pauper!
O He Who safeguards the fearful seeker of protection!
O He Who governs and determines!

verses.text: يَا مَنِ ٱلْعَسِيرُ عَلَيْهِ سَهْلٌ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: O He for Whom the difficult is simple and easy!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ لاَ يَحْتَاجُ إِلَىٰ تَفْسِيرٍ
verses.translation: O He Who never needs an explanation!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN LA YAHTAJU ILA TAFSIRIN

verses.text: يَا مَنْ هُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: O He Who is powerful over everything!'
verses.transliteration: YA MAN HUWA `ALA KULLI SHAY'IN QADIRUN

verses.text: يَا مَنْ هُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: O He Who is aware of everything!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN HUWA BIKULLI SHAY'IN KHABIRUN

verses.text: يَا مَنْ هُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: O He Who sees everything!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN HUWA BIKULLI SHAY'IN BASIRUN

verses.translation: O Sender of the winds!
O Cleaver of the dawn!
O Dispatcher of the spirits!
O Lord of munificence and forbearance!
O He in Whose Hand is every key!
O He Who hears every sound!
O He Who takes precedence over everything that passes away!

verses.text: يَا مُحْيِي كُلِّ نَفْسٍ بَعْدَ ٱلْمَوْتِ
verses.translation: O He Who gives life to every soul after death!
verses.transliteration: YA MUHYIYA KULLI NAFSIN BA`DA ALMAWTI

verses.translation: O my Provision in my hardship!
O my Maintainer in my exile!
O my Intimate in my lonesomeness!
O my Sponsor in my blessings!
O my haven when the ways make me weary,
when relatives give me up
and when every companion forsakes me!

verses.text: يَا عِمَادَ مَنْ لاَ عِمَادَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Backing of him who has no backing!

verses.text: يَا سَنَدَ مَنْ لاَ سَنَدَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Support of him who has no support!
verses.transliteration: YA SANADA MAN LA SANADA LAHU

verses.text: يَا ذُخْرَ مَنْ لاَ ذُخْرَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Store of him who has no store!
verses.transliteration: YA DHUKHRA MAN LA DHUKHRA LAHU

verses.text: يَا حِرْزَ مَنْ لاَ حِرْزَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Sanctuary of him who has no sanctuary!
verses.transliteration: YA HIRZA MAN LA HIRZA LAHU

verses.text: يَا كَهْفَ مَنْ لاَ كَهْفَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Cave of him who has no cave!
verses.transliteration: YA KAHFA MAN LA KAHFA LAHU

verses.text: يَا كَنْزَ مَنْ لاَ كَنْزَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Treasure of him who has no treasure!
verses.transliteration: YA KANZA MAN LA KANZA LAHU

verses.text: يَا رُكْنَ مَنْ لاَ رُكْنَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O castle of him who has no castle!
verses.transliteration: YA RUKNA MAN LA RUKNA LAHU

verses.text: يَا غِيَاثَ مَنْ لاَ غِيَاثَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O Help of him who has no help!
verses.transliteration: YA GHIYATHA MAN LA GHIYATHA LAHU

verses.text: يَا جَارَ مَنْ لاَ جَارَ لَهُ
verses.translation: O backer of him who has no backer!
verses.transliteration: YA JARA MAN LA JARA LAHU

verses.translation: O my Adjacent Neighbor!
O my Sturdy Pillar!
O My God in truth!
O Lord of the Ancient House!
O All-affectionate! O Friend!
Deliver me from the chains of strictures,

verses.text: وَٱصْرِفْ عَنِّي كُلَّ هَمٍّ وَغَمٍّ وَضِيقٍ
verses.translation: turn away from me every care, grief and distress,
verses.transliteration: WASRIF `ANNI KULLA HAMMIN WA GHAMMIN WA DIQIN

verses.translation: protect me from the evil of that which I cannot bear,
and help me in that which I am able to bear!
O He Who returned Joseph to Jacob!
O He Who removed the affliction of Job!
O He Who forgave the sin of David!

verses.text: يَا رَافِعَ عِيسَىٰ بْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَمُنجِيهِ مِنْ ايْدِي ٱلْيَهُودِ
verses.translation: O He Who caused Jesus, the son of Mary, to ascend and delivered him from the hands of the Jews!
verses.transliteration: YA RAFI`A `ISA IBNI MARYAMA WA MUNJIYAHU MIN A Y DI ALYAHUDI

verses.text: يَا مُجِيبَ نِدَاءِ يُونُسَ فِي ٱلظُّلُمَاتِ
verses.translation: O He Who answered Jonah's call in the darkness!
verses.transliteration: YA MUJIBA NIDA'I YUNUSA FI ALZZULUMATI

verses.translation: O He Who chose Moses by spoken words!
O He Who forgave Adam his slip
and raised Idris to a high place through his mercy!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ نَجَّىٰ نُوحاً مِنَ ٱلغَرَقِ
verses.translation: O He Who saved Noah from drowning!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN NAJJA NUHAN MINA ALGHARAQI

verses.translation: O He Who destroyed `ªd, the ancient,
and Thamud, and did not spare them,
and the people of Noah before;
certainly, they were most unjust and more rebellious,
verses.transliteration: INNAHUM KANU HUM AZLAMA WA ATGHA

verses.translation: and al-Mu'tafikah, He also overthrew.

verses.text: يَا مَنْ دَمَّرَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: O He Who destroyed the people of Lot
and crushed the people of Shu`ayb!
O He Who took Abraham for a friend!
O You Who took Moses for an object of His words,

verses.text: وَٱتَّخَذَ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّىٰ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَعَلَيْهِمْ اجْمَعِينَ حَبِيباً
verses.translation: and took Muhammad, may Allah bless him and his Household, for a beloved!
verses.transliteration: WATTKHADHA MUHAMMADAN SALLA ALLAHU `ALAYHI WA ALIHI WA `ALAYHIM AJMA`INA HABIBAN

verses.translation: O He Who gave Luqman wisdom,
and bestowed upon Solomon a kingdom
such as may not befit anyone after him!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ نَصَرَ ذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ عَلىٰ ٱلْمُلُوكِ ٱلْجَبَابِرَةِ
verses.translation: O He Who gave Dhul-Qarnayn victory over the tyrannical kings!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN NASARA DHALQARNAYNI `ALA ALMULUKI ALJABABIRATI

verses.translation: O He Who gave al-Khadir (eternal) life

verses.text: وَرَدَّ لِيُوشَعَ بْنِ نُونٍ ٱلشَّمْسَ بَعْدَ غُرُوبِهَا
verses.translation: and returned the sun to Joshua, the son of Nun, after its setting!
verses.transliteration: WA RADDA LIYUSHA`A BNI NUNIN ALSHSHAMSA BA`DA GHURUBIHA

verses.text: يَا مَنْ رَبَطَ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِ امِّ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: O He Who strengthened the heart of Moses' mother,
verses.transliteration: YA MAN RABATA `ALA QALBI UMMI MUSA

verses.translation: and guarded the virginity of Mary, the daughter of `Imran!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ حَصَّنَ يَحْيَىٰ بْنَ زَكَرِيَّا مِنَ ٱلذَّنْبِ
verses.translation: O He Who fortified John, the son of Zachariah, against sins
verses.transliteration: YA MAN HASSANA YAHYA IBNA ZAKARIYYA MINA ALDHDHANBI

verses.translation: and calmed the anger of Moses!
O He Who gave Zachariah the good news of the birth of John!

verses.text: يَا مَنْ فَدَىٰ إِسْمَاعِيلَ مِنَ ٱلذَّبْحِ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: O He Who ransomed Ishmael from the sacrifice with a mighty sacrifice!
verses.transliteration: YA MAN FADA ISMA`ILA MINA ALDHDHABHI BIDHIBHIN `AZIMIN

verses.translation: O He Who accepted the sacrifice of Abel
and placed a curse upon Cain!

verses.text: يَا هَازِمَ ٱلاحْزَابَ لِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّىٰ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ
verses.translation: O He Who routed the parties for Muhammad, may Allah bless him and his Household!
verses.transliteration: YA HAZIMA AL-AHZABI LIMUHAMMADIN SALLA ALLAHU `ALAYHI WA ALIHI

verses.translation: (please do) Bless Muhammad, the household of Muhammad,
all the messengers, Your archangels,
verses.transliteration: WA `ALA JAMI`I ALMURSALINA WA MALA'IKATIKA ALMUQARRABINA

verses.translation: and all those who obey You!

verses.text: وَاسْالُكَ بِكُلِّ مَسْالَةٍ سَالَكَ بِهَا احَدٌ
verses.translation: I beseech You the supplication of every one who has besought you
verses.transliteration: WA AS'ALUKA BIKULLI MAS'ALATIN SA'ALAKA BIHA AHADUN

verses.text: مِمَنْ رَضِيتَ عَنْهُ فَحَتَمْتَ لَهُ عَلىٰ ٱلإِجَابَةِ
verses.translation: and with whom You have been pleased and thus decided to grant his request.

verses.text: يَا اَللَّهُ يَا اَللَّهُ يَا اَللَّهُ
verses.translation: O Allah! O Allah! O Allah!
verses.transliteration: YA ALLAHU YA ALLAHU YA ALLAHU

verses.text: يَا رَحْمٰنُ يَا رَحْمٰنُ يَا رَحْمٰنُ
verses.translation: O All-merciful! O All-merciful! O All-merciful!
verses.transliteration: YA RAHMANU YA RAHMANU YA RAHMANU

verses.text: يَا رَحِيمُ يَا رَحِيمُ يَا رَحِيمُ
verses.translation: O All-compassionate! O All-compassionate! O All-compassionate!
verses.transliteration: YA RAHIMU YA RAHIMU YA RAHIMU

verses.translation: O Lord of majesty and honor!
O Lord of majesty and honor!
O Lord of majesty and honor!

verses.text: بِهِ بِهِ بِهِ بِهِ بِهِ بِهِ بِهِ
verses.translation: By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him!
verses.transliteration: BIHI BIHI BIHI BIHI BIHI BIHI BIHI

verses.text: اسْالُكَ بِكُلِّ ٱسْمٍ سَمَّيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ
verses.translation: I beseech You by every Name with which You have named Yourself
verses.transliteration: AS'ALUKA BIKULLI ISMIN SAMMAYTA BIHI NAFSAKA

verses.text: اوْ انْزَلْتَهُ فِي شَيْءٍ مِنْ كُتُبِكَ
verses.translation: or which You have sent down in one of Your scriptures
verses.transliteration: AW ANZALTAHU FI SHAY'IN MIN KUTUBIKA

verses.text: اوِ ٱسْتَاثَرْتَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ ٱلَّذِي عِنْدَكَ
verses.translation: or kept for Yourself in the knowledge of the Unseen with You,
by the junctures of might for Your Throne,
by the utmost limit of mercy from Your Book,

verses.text: وَبِمَا ﴿وَلَوْ انّ َمَا فِي ٱلارْضِ مِنْ شَجَرَةٍ اقْلاَمٌ
verses.translation: by the fact that, “though all the trees in the earth were pens
verses.transliteration: WA BIMA WA LAW ANNA MA FI AL-ARDI MIN SHAJARATIN AQLAMUN

verses.text: وَٱلْبَحْرُ يَمُدُّهُ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ سَبْعَةُ ابْحُرٍ
verses.translation: and the sea - seven seas after it to replenish it,
verses.transliteration: WALBAHRU YAMUDDUHU MIN BA`DIHI SAB`ATU ABHURIN

verses.translation: yet the words of Allah not be spent.
Allah is All-mighty, All-wise.”
And I beseech You by Your Most Excellent Names
that You have described in Your book thus saying,
“To Allah belong the Most Excellent Names, so call Him by them!”
verses.transliteration: WA LILLAHI AL-ASMA'U ALHUSNA FAD`UHU BIHA

verses.translation: And You said: “Call upon Me and I will answer you.”

verses.text: وَقُلْتَ: ﴿وَإِذَا سَالَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ
verses.translation: And You said: “And when My servants ask you concerning Me, then surely I am very near;
verses.transliteration: WA QULTA WA IDHA SA'ALAKA `IBADI `ANNI FA'INNI QARIBUN

verses.translation: I answer the prayer of the suppliant when he calls on Me.”

verses.text: وَقُلْتَ: ﴿قُلْ يَا عِبَادِي ٱلَّذِينَ اسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ انْفُسِهِمْ
verses.translation: And You said: “Say: O My servants who have been prodigal against yourselves;
verses.transliteration: WA QULTA QUL YA `IBADIYA ALLADHINA ASRAFU `ALA ANFUSIHIM

verses.translation: do not despair of Allah's mercy.
Surely, Allah forgives all sins.
Surely, He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.”
And I ask You, O my God,
I call You, O my Lord,
I please You, O my Master,

verses.text: وَاطْمَعُ فِي إِجَابَتِي يَا مَوْلايَ كَمَا وَعَدتَّنِي
verses.translation: and I desire for You to respond to me, O my Protector, just as You have promised me—
verses.transliteration: WA ATMA`U FI IJABATI YA MAWLAYA KAMA WA`ADTANI

verses.translation: for I have called You just as You have commanded me.

verses.text: فَٱفْعَلْ بِي مَا انتَ اهْلُهُ يَا كَرِيمُ
verses.translation: So, do to me what is worthy of You, O All-generous!
verses.transliteration: FAF`AL BI MA ANTA AHLUHU YA KARIMU

verses.translation: All praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.text: وَصَلَّىٰ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ اجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: May Allah bless Muhammad and his entire Household.
verses.transliteration: WA SALLA ALLAHU `ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALIHI AJMA`INA

verses.translation: O Allah the Lord of the Great Light,
the Lord of the Elevated Throne,
the Lord of the swollen ocean,
the Revealer of the Torah, the Gospel, and the Psalms,
the Lord of shade and heat,
the Revealer of the Great Qur'an,
and the Lord of the Archangels,
the Prophets, and the Messengers:
O Allah, I beseech You in Your Noble Name,
in the Light of Your Luminous Face
and Your Eternal Kingdom.
O Ever-living! O Self-Subsistent!

verses.text: أَسْأَلُكَ بِٱسْمِكَ ٱلَّذِي أَشْرَقَتْ بِهِ ٱلسَّمَاوَاتُ وَٱلأَرَضُونَ
verses.translation: I beseech You in the name of Your Name with which the heavens and the earth have lit up
verses.transliteration: AS'ALUKA BISMIKA ALLADHI ASHRAQAT BIHI ALSSAMAWATU WAL-ARADUNA

verses.text: وَبِٱسْمِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَصْلَحُ بِهِ ٱلأَوَّلُونَ وَٱلآخِرُونَ
verses.translation: and in Your Name with which the past and the coming generations have become upright!
verses.transliteration: WA BISMIKA ALLADHI YASLUHU BIHI AL-AWWALUNA WAL-AKHIRUNA

verses.translation: O He Who has been always alive before the existence of all living things!
O He Who shall be alive after the extinction of all living things!
verses.transliteration: WA YA HAYYAN BA`DA KULLI HAYYIN

verses.translation: O He Who has been always alive even when there was nothing else alive!
verses.transliteration: WA YA HAYYAN HINA LA HAYYU

verses.translation: O He Who revives the dead ones and causes the living ones to die!
verses.transliteration: YA MUHYIYA ALMAWTA WA MUMITA AL-AHYA'I

verses.text: يَا حَيُّ لا إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
verses.translation: O Ever-living! There is no god save You.
verses.transliteration: YA HAYYU LA ILAHA ILLA ANTA

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ بَلِّغْ مَوْلاَنَا ٱلإِمَامَ ٱلْهَادِيَ ٱلْمَهْدِيَّ ٱلْقَائِمَ بِأَمْرِكَ
verses.translation: O Allah, convey to our master Imam al-Mahdi, the guide who is to undertake Your orders,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA BALLIGH MAWLANA AL-IMAMA ALHADIYA ALMAHDIYYA ALQA'IMA BI'AMRIKA

verses.text: صَلَوَاتُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ آبَائِهِ ٱلطَّاهِرِينَ
verses.translation: may Allah’s blessings be upon him and upon his immaculate fathers,
on behalf of all of the believing men and women
in the east and west of the earth
and in plains, mountains,
lands, and seas,
and on behalf of my parents
(convey to him) blessings that are as weighty as Allah’s Throne,
as much as the ink of His Words,

verses.text: وَمَا أَحْصَاهُ عِلْمُهُ وَأَحَاطَ بِهِ كِتَابُهُ
verses.translation: and as many as that which is counted by His knowledge and encompassed by His Book.
verses.transliteration: WA MA AHSAHU `ILMUHU WA AHATA BIHI KITABUHU

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أُجَدِّدُ لَهُ فِي صَبِيحَةِ يَوْمِي هٰذَا
verses.translation: O Allah, I update to him in the beginning of this day
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI UJADDIDU LAHU FI SABIHATI YAWMI HADHA

verses.translation: and throughout the days of lifetime a pledge,

verses.text: عَهْداً وَعَقْداً وَبَيْعَةً لَهُ فِي عُنُقِي
verses.translation: a covenant, and allegiance to which I commit myself

verses.text: لا أَحُولُ عنها وَلا أَزُولُ أَبَداً
verses.translation: and from which I neither convert nor change.
verses.transliteration: LA AHULU `ANHU WA LA AZULU ABADAN

verses.translation: O Allah, (please do) make me of his supporters,
sponsors, defenders,
and those who hurry in carrying out his instructions,
those who comply with his orders,
those who uphold him,
those who precede others to implementing his will,
and those who will be martyred before him.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنْ حَالَ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَهُ ٱلْمَوْتُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلْتَهُ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِكَ حَتْماً مَقْضِيّاً
verses.translation: O Allah, if death that You have made inevitably and certainly incumbent upon Your servants stands between me and him,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA IN HALA BAYNI WA BAYNAHU ALMAWTU ALLADHI JA`ALTAHU `ALA `IBADIKA HATMAN MAQDIYYAN

verses.translation: then (please do) take me out of my grave using my shroud as dress,
unsheathing my sword,
holding my lance in my hand,

verses.text: مُلَبِّياً دَعْوَةَ ٱلدَّاعِي فِي ٱلْحَاضِرِ وَٱلْبَادِي
verses.translation: and responding to the call of the Caller who shall announce (his advent) in urban areas and deserts.
O Allah, (please do) show me his magnificent mien
and his praiseworthy forehead,
delight my eyes by letting me have a look at him.
And (please) expedite his relief,
make his reappearance easy,
clear a spacious space for him,
guide me to follow his course,
give success to his issues,
and confirm his strength.
O Allah, construct Your lands through him
and refresh Your servants through him,
For You have said, and true are Your words:
“Corruption has appeared in the land and the sea
on account of what the hands of men have wrought.”
So, O Allah, (please) show us Your vicegerent,
the son of Your Prophet,
and the namesake of Your Messenger,
peace be upon him and his Household,

verses.text: حَتَّىٰ لا يَظْفَرَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ ٱلْبَاطِلِ إِلاَّ مَزَّقَهُ
verses.translation: so that he shall tear up any wrong item that he will face
verses.transliteration: HATTA LA YAZFARA BISHAY'IN MIN ALBATILI ILLA MAZZAQAHU

verses.translation: and shall confirm and approve of the truth.
verses.transliteration: WA YAHIQQA ALHAQQA WA YUHAQQIQAHU WAJ`ALHU

verses.translation: O Allah, (please) make him the shelter to whom Your wronged servants shall resort,

verses.text: وَنَاصِراً لِمَنْ لا يَجِدُ لَهُ نَاصِراً غَيْرَكَ
verses.translation: the supporter of those who cannot find any supporter save You,
verses.transliteration: WA NASIRAN LIMAN LA YAJIDU LAHU NASIRAN GHAYRAKA

verses.text: وَمُجَدِّداً لِمَا عُطِّلَ مِنْ أَحْكَامِ كِتَابِكَ
verses.translation: the reviver of the laws of Your Book that have been suspended,
verses.transliteration: WA MUJADDIDAN LIMA `UTTILA MIN AHKAMI KITABIKA

verses.text: وَمُشَيِّداً لِمَا وَرَدَ مِنْ أَعْلامِ دِينِكَ وَسُنَنِ نَبِيِّكَ
verses.translation: and the constructor of all signs of Your religion and instructions of Your Messenger,
verses.transliteration: WA MUSHAYYIDAN LIMA WARADA MIN A`LAMI DINIKA WA SUNANI NABIYYIKA

verses.translation: peace be upon him and his Household, that he will see.

verses.text: ٱللَّهُمَّ مِمَّنْ حَصَّنْتَهُ مِنْ بَأُسِ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
verses.translation: O Allah, (please) include him with those whom You protect from the domination of the aggressors.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA MIMMAN HASSANTAHU MIN BA'SI ALMU`TADINA

verses.translation: O Allah, (please) delight Your Prophet Muhammad,
peace be upon him and his Household,
as well as all those who followed him in his promulgation by making (us) see him,
and (please) have mercy upon our humiliation after him.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ ٱكْشِفْ هٰذِهِ ٱلْغُمَّةَ عَنْ هٰذِهِ ٱلأُمَّةِ بِحُضُورِهِ
verses.translation: O Allah, (please) relieve this community from the (current) grief through presenting him
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA IKSHIF HADHIHI ALGHUMMATA `AN HADHIHI AL-UMMATI BIHUDURIHI

verses.translation: and expedite his advent for us:
“Surely, they think it to be far off, and We see it nigh.”
verses.transliteration: INNAHUM YARAWNAHU BA`IDAN WA NARAHU QARIBAN

verses.translation: [do all that] In the name of Your mercy; O most merciful of all those who show mercy.

verses.text: أَللَّهُمَّ يَا مَنْ لا يَصِفُهُ نَعْتُ الْوَاصِفِينَ
verses.translation: O God, O He whom the depiction of the describers fails to describe!

verses.text: وَيَا مَنْ لاَ يُجَاوِزُهُ رَجَاءُ الرَّاجِينَ
verses.translation: O He beyond whom passes not the hope of the hopers!

verses.text: وَيَا مَنْ لاَ يَضِيعُ لَدَيْهِ أَجْرُ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: O He with whom is not lost the wage of the good-doers!
verses.transliteration: WA YAA MAL-LAA YAZ''EEU' LADAY-HEEE AJ-RUL-MUH'-SINEEN

verses.text: وَيَا مَنْ هُوَ مُنْتَهَى خَوْفِ الْعَابِدِيْنَ
verses.translation: O He who is the ultimate object of the fear of the worshipers!
verses.transliteration: WA YAA MAN HUWA MUNTAHAA KHAW-FIL-A'ABIDEEN

verses.text: وَيَا مَنْ هُوَ غَايَةُ خَشْيَةِ الْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: O He who is the utmost limit of the dread of the godfearing!
verses.transliteration: WA YAA MAN HUWA GHAAYATU KHASH-YATIL-MUT-TAQEEN

verses.text: هَذا مَقَامُ مَنْ تَدَاوَلَتْهُ أَيْدِي الذُّنُوبِ
verses.translation: This is the station of him whom sins have passed from hand to hand.
Offenses' reins have led him on,
and Satan has gained mastery over him.
He fell short of what You hast commanded through neglect
and he pursued what You hast prohibited in delusion,
verses.transliteration: WA TAA'AT'AA MAA NAHAY-TA A'N-HOO TAGH-REERAA

verses.translation: like one ignorant of Your power over him
or one who denies the bounty of Your beneficence toward him,

verses.text: حَتَّى إذَا انْفَتَحَ لَهُ بَصَرُ الْهُدَى
verses.translation: until, when the eye of guidance was opened for him

verses.text: وَتَقَشَّعَتْ عَنْهُ سَحَائِبُ الْعَمَى أَحْصَى مَا ظَلَمَ بِهِ نَفْسَهُ
verses.translation: and the clouds of blindness were dispelled, he reckoned that through which he had wronged himself
verses.transliteration: WA TAQASH-SHAA'T A'N-HOO SAH'AAA-IBUL-A'MAA AH'-S'AA MAA Z'ALAMA BIHEE NAF-SAH

verses.translation: and reflected upon that in which he had opposed his Lord.
verses.transliteration: WA FAK-KARA FEEMAA KHAALAFA BIHEE RAB-BAH

verses.text: فَرَأى كَبِيْرَ عِصْيَانِهِ كَبِيْراً وَجَلِيل مُخالفَتِهِ جَلِيْلاً
verses.translation: He saw his vast disobedience as vast and his great opposition as great.
verses.transliteration: FARAAA KABEERA I'S'-YAANIHEE KABEERAW-WA JALEELA MUKHAALAFATIHEE JALEELAA

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَ نَحْوَكَ مُؤَمِّلاً لَكَ مُسْتَحْيِيَاً مِنْكَ
verses.translation: So turned to You, hoping in You and ashamed before You,
and he directed his beseeching toward You, having trust in You.

verses.text: فَأَمَّكَ بِطَمَعِهِ يَقِيناً وَقَصَدَكَ بِخَوْفِهِ إخْلاَصَاً
verses.translation: He repaired to You in his longing with certitude and he went straight to You in fear with sincerity.
verses.transliteration: FAAM-MAKA BIT'AMAI'HEE YAQEENAA WA QAS'ADAKA BIKHAW-FIHEEE IKH-LAAS'AA

verses.text: قَدْ خَلاَ طَمَعُهُ مِنْ كُلِّ مَطْمُوع فِيهِ غَيْرِكَ
verses.translation: His longing was devoid of every object of longing but You,
verses.transliteration: QAD KHALAA T'AMAU'HOO MIN KUL-LI MAT'-MOOI'N FEEHEE GHAY-RIK

verses.text: وَأَفْرَخَ رَوْعُهُ مِنْ كُلِّ مَحْذُور مِنْهُ سِوَاكَ
verses.translation: and his fright departed from every object of fear but You.
verses.transliteration: WA AF-RAKHA RAW-U'HOO MIN KUL-LI MAH'-D'OORIM-MIN-HOO SIWAAK

verses.translation: So he stood before You pleading,
his eyes turned toward the ground in humbleness,
his head bowed before Your might in lowliness;

verses.text: وَأَبَثَّكَ مِنْ سِرِّهِ مَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنْهُ خَضُوعاً
verses.translation: he revealed to You in meekness those secrets of his which You know better than he;
verses.transliteration: WA ABATH-THAKA MIN SIR-RIHEE MAAA ANTA SA'-LAMU BIHEE MIN-HOO KHUZ''OOA'A

verses.text: وَعَدَّدَ مِنْ ذُنُوبِهِ مَا أَنْتَ أَحْصَى لَهَا خُشُوعاً
verses.translation: he numbered for You in humility those sins of his which You count better than he;
verses.transliteration: WA A'D-DADA MIN D'UNOOBIHEE MAAA ANTA AH'-S'AA LAHAA KHUSHOOA'A

verses.text: وَاسْتَغَاثَ بِكَ مِنْ عَظِيمِ مَاوَقَعَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِكَ
verses.translation: he sought help from You before the dreadful into which he has fallen in Your knowledge
verses.transliteration: WAS-TAGHAATHA BIKA MIN- A'Z'EEMI MAA WAQAA' BIHEE FEE I'L-MIK

verses.translation: and the ugly which has disgraced him in Your judgement:
verses.transliteration: WA QABEEHEE MAA FAZ''AH'AHOO FEE H'UK-MIKA

verses.translation: the sins whose pleasures have turned their backs and gone
and whose evil consequences have stayed and stuck fast.

verses.text: لا يُنْكِرُ يَا إلهِي عَدْلَكَ إنْ عَاقَبْتَهُ
verses.translation: He will not deny Your justice, my God, if You punish him,
verses.transliteration: LAA YUNKIRU YAAA ILAAHEE A'D-LAKA IN A'AQAB-TAH

verses.text: وَلا يَسْتَعْظِمُ عَفْوَكَ إنْ عَفَوْتَ عَنْهُ وَرَحِمْتَهُ;
verses.translation: nor will he consider Your pardon great if You pardon him and hast mercy upon him,
verses.transliteration: WA LAA YAS-TAA'-Z'IMU A'F-WAKA IN A'FAW-TA A'N-HOO WA RAH'IM-TAH

verses.translation: for You art the Generous Lord

verses.text: الَّذِي لا يَتَعَاظَمُهُ غُفْرَانُ الذَّنْبِ الْعَظِيم
verses.translation: for whom the forgiveness of great sins is nothing great!

verses.text: أَللَّهُمَّ فَهَا أَنَا ذَا قَدْ جئْتُكَ مُطِيعاً
verses.translation: O God, so here I am: I have come to You obeying Your command
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA FAHAAA ANA D'AA QAD JI-TUKA MUT'EEA'N LIAM-RIK

verses.text: لاِمْرِكَ فِيمَا أَمَرْتَ بِهِ مِنَ الدُّعَاءِ
verses.translation: (for You hast commanded supplication)

verses.text: مَتَنَجِّزاً وَعْدَكَ فِيمَا وَعَدْتَ بِهِ مِنَ الإجَابَةِ إذْ تَقُولُ
verses.translation: and asking the fulfilment of Your promise, (for You hast promised to respond):
verses.transliteration: MUTANAJ-JIZAW-WAA'-DAKA FEEMAA WAA'T-TA BIHEE MINAL-IJAABAH ID' TAQOOLU

verses.translation: You hast said, 'Supplicate Me and I will respond to you' [40:60].
O God, so bless Muhammad and his Household,
meet me with Your forgiveness just as I have met You with my confession,
verses.transliteration: WA AL-QANEE BIMAGH-FIRATIKA KAMAA LAQEETUKA BIIQ-RAAREE

verses.text: وَارْفَعْنِي عَنْ مَصَارعِ الذُّنُوبِ كَمَا وَضَعْتُ لَكَ نَفْسِي
verses.translation: lift me up from the fatal infirmities of sins just as I have let myself down before You,
verses.transliteration: WAR-FAA'-NEE A'M-MAS'AARII'D'-D'UNOOBI KAMAA WAZ''AA'-TU LAKA NAF-SEE

verses.text: وَاسْتُرْنِي بِسِتْرِكَ كَمَا تَأَنَّيْتَنِي عَنِ الانْتِقَامِ مِنِّي
verses.translation: and cover me with Your covering just as You hast shown no haste to take vengeance on me!
verses.transliteration: WAS-TUR-NEE BISIT-RIKA KAMAA TAAN-NAY-TANEE A'N?LINTIQAAMI MIN-NEE

verses.translation: O God, make firm my intention to obey You,
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA WA THAB-BIT FEE T'AAA'TIKA NEE-YATEE

verses.translation: strengthen my insight in worshipping You,
give me the success of works

verses.text: لِمَا تَغْسِلُ بِهِ دَنَسَ الخَطَايَا عَنِّي
verses.translation: which will wash away the defilement of offenses,
and take me when You take me in the creed of Your prophet
verses.transliteration: WA TAWAF-FANEE A'LAA MIL-LATIKA WAMIL-LATI NABEE-YIKA

verses.translation: Muhammad (upon him be peace).

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ إنِّي أَتُوبُ إلَيْـكَ فِي مَقَامِي هَذَا
verses.translation: O God, I repent to You in this my station from
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA IN-NEEE ATOOBU ILAY-KA FEE MAQAAMEE HAD'AA

verses.translation: my sins, great and small,
my evil deeds, inward and outward,
my lapses, past and recent,

verses.text: تَوْبَةَ مَنْ لا يُحَدِّثُ نَفْسَهُ بِمَعْصِيَةٍ
verses.translation: with the repentance of one who does not tell himself that he might disobey

verses.text: وَلاَ يُضْمِرُ أَنْ يَعُودَ فِي خَطِيئَةٍ
verses.translation: or secretly think that he might return to an offense.
verses.transliteration: WA LAA YUZ''-MIRU AY-YAU'WDA FEE KHAT'EE-AH

verses.text: وَقَدْ قُلْتَ يَا إلهِي فِي مُحْكَمِ كِتابِكَ
verses.translation: You hast said, my God, in the firm text of Your Book,
verses.transliteration: WA QAD QUL-TA YAAA ILAAHEE FEE MUH'-KAMI KITAABIKA

verses.translation: that You 'accept repentance from Your servants,
pardon evil deeds' [42:25], and love the repenters [2:222],

verses.text: فَاقْبَلْ تَوْبَتِي كَمَا وَعَدْتَ وَأعْفُ عَنْ سَيِّئاتِي كَمَا ضَمِنْتَ
verses.translation: so accept my repentance as You hast promised, pardon my evil deeds as You hast guaranteed,
verses.transliteration: FAQ-BAL TAW-BATEE KAMAA WAA'T-T WAA'-FU A'N SAY-YI-AATEE KAMAA Z''AMINT

verses.translation: and make obligatory toward me Your love as You hast stipulated!
verses.transliteration: WA AW-JIB LEE MAH'AB-BATAKA KAMAA SHARAT'-T

verses.text: وَلَـكَ يَـا رَبِّ شَـرْطِي أَلاّ أَعُودَ فِي مَكْرُوهِكَ
verses.translation: To You, my Lord, belongs my stipulation that I will not return to what is disliked by You,
verses.transliteration: WA LAKA YAA RAB SHAR-T'EEE AL-LAAA AU'WDA FEE MAK-ROOHIK

verses.translation: my guarantee that I will not go back to what You blame,
verses.transliteration: WA Z''AMAANEEE AL-LAAA AR-JIA' FEE MAD'-MOOMIK

verses.translation: and my covenant that I will stay away from acts of disobedience to You.
verses.transliteration: WA A'H-DEEE AN AH-JURA JAMEEA' MAA'AS'EEK

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ إنَّكَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا عَمِلْتُ فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَا عَلِمْتَ
verses.translation: O God, You know better what I have done, so forgive me what You know
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA IN-NAKA AA'-LAMU BIMAA A'MIL-T FAGH-FIR LEE MAA A'LIM-T

verses.translation: and turn me through Your power to what You love!
O God, counted against me are claims that stay in my memory
and claims that I have forgotten,
while all of them remain in Your eye that does not sleep
and Your knowledge that does not forget!

verses.text: فَعَوِّضْ مِنْهَا أَهْلَهَا وَاحْطُطْ عَنّي وِزْرَهَا
verses.translation: So compensate their owners, lighten their load upon me,
verses.transliteration: FAA'W-WIZ'' MIN-HAAA AH-LAHAA WAH'-T'UT' A'N-NEE WIZ-RAHAA

verses.text: وَخَفِّفْ عَنِّي ثِقْلَهَا وَاعْصِمْنِي مِنْ أَنْ اُقَارِفَ مِثْلَهَا
verses.translation: lift up their weight from me, and preserve me from approaching their like!
verses.transliteration: WA KHAF-FIF A'N-NEE THIQ-LAHAA WAA'-S'IM-NEE MIN AN UQAARIFA MITH-LAHAA

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ وَإنَّهُ لاَ وَفَاءَ لِي بِالتَّوْبَةِ إلاَّ بِعِصْمَتِكَ
verses.translation: O God, but I can not be faithful to my repentance without Your preservation,
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA WA IN-NAHOO LAA WAFAAA-A LEE BIT-TAW-BATI IL-LAA BII'S'-MATIK

verses.text: وَلا اسْتِمْسَاكَ بِي عَنِ الْخَطَايَا إلاَّ عَنْ قُوَّتِكَ
verses.translation: nor can I refrain from offenses without Your strength.
verses.transliteration: WA LAA AS-TIM-SAAKA BEE A'NIL-KHAT'AAYAAA IL-LAA A'N QOO-WATIK

verses.text: فَقَوِّنِي بِقُوَّة كَافِيَة وَتَوَلَّنِي بِعِصْمَة مَانِعَة
verses.translation: So strengthen me with a sufficient strength and attend to me with a defending preservation!
verses.transliteration: FAQAW-WINEE BIQOO-WATIN KAAFEEAH WA TAWAL-LANEE BII'S'-MATIM-MAANIA'H

verses.translation: O God, if any servant repents to You,

verses.text: وَهُوَ فِي عِلْمِ الْغَيْبِ عِنْدَكَ فَاسِخٌ لِتَوْبَتِهِ
verses.translation: while in Your knowledge of the Unseen he will break his repentance
verses.transliteration: WA HUWA FEE I'L-MIL-GHAY-BI I'NDAKA FAASIKHUL-LITAW-BATIH

verses.translation: and return to his sin and offense,

verses.text: فَإنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أنْ أَكُوْنَ كَذلِكَ
verses.translation: I seek refuge in You lest I be like that!
verses.transliteration: FA IN-NEE E AU'WD'U BIKA AN AKOONA KAD'ALIK

verses.text: فَاجْعَلْ تَوْبَتِي هَذِهِ تَوْبَةً لا أَحْتَاجُ بَعْدَهَا إلَى تَوْبَة
verses.translation: So make this my repentance a repentance after which I will need no repentance
verses.transliteration: FAJ-A'L TAW-BATEE HD'IH TAW-BATAL-LAAA AH'-TAAJU BAA'-DAHAAA ILAA TAW-BAH

verses.text: تَوْبَةً مُوجِبَةً لِمَحْوِ مَا سَلَفَ وَالسَّلاَمَةِ فِيمَـا بَقِيَ
verses.translation: and a repentance which will obligate the erasing of what has gone by and safety in what remains!
verses.transliteration: TAW-BATAM-MOOJIBATAL-LIMAH'-WI MAA SALAFA WAS-SALAAMATI FEEMAA BAQEE

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ إنِّي أَعْتَـذِرُ إلَيْـكَ مِنْ جَهْلِي
verses.translation: O God, I ask pardon from You for my ignorance,
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA IN-NEEE AA'-TAD'IRU ILAY-KA MIN JAH-LEE

verses.translation: and I ask You to disregard my evil acts!
So join me to the shelter of Your mercy through graciousness
and cover me with the covering of Your well-being through bounteousness!
O God, I repent to You
from everything opposed to Your will
or far from Your love -
the thoughts of my heart,
the glances of my eye,
the tales of my tongue -

verses.text: تَوْبَةً تَسْلَمُ بِهَا كُلُّ جَارِحَة عَلَى حِيَالِهَا مِنْ تَبِعَاتِكَ
verses.translation: with a repentance through which each bodily part will by itself stay safe from ill consequences with You
verses.transliteration: TAW-BATAN TAS-LAMU BIHAA KUL-LU JAARIH'ATIN A'LAA H'EEAALIHAA MIN TABIA'ATIKA

verses.text: وَتَأْمَنُ مِمَّا يَخَافُ الْمُعْتَدُونَ مِنْ أَلِيْمِ سَطَوَاتِكَ
verses.translation: and remain secure from Your painful penalties feared by transgressors!
verses.transliteration: WA TAA-MANU MIM-MAA YAKHAAFUL-MUA'-TADOONA MIN SLEEMI SAT'AWAATIK

verses.translation: O God, so have mercy on my being alone before You,
the pounding of my heart in dread of You,
the trembling of my limbs in awe of You!

verses.text: فَقَدْ أَقَامَتْنِي يَا رَبِّ ذُنُوبِي مَقَامَ الْخِزْيِ بِفِنَائِكَ
verses.translation: My sins, my God, have stood me in the station of degradation in Your courtyard.
verses.transliteration: FAQAD AQAAMAT-NEE YAA RAB-BI D'UNOOBEE MAQAAMAL-KHIZ-YI BIFINAAA-IK

verses.text: فَإنْ سَكَتُّ لَمْ يَنْطِقْ عَنِّي أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: If I remain silent, none will speak for me;
verses.transliteration: FAAN SAKAT-TU LAM YANT'IQ A'N-NEEE AH'AD

verses.translation: if I seek an intercessor, I am not worthy for intercession.
O God, bless Muhammad and his Household,
make Your generosity intercede for my offenses,
follow up my evil deeds with Your pardon,
repay me not with the punishment that is my proper repayment,
verses.transliteration: WA LAA TAJ-ZINEE JAZAAA-EE MIN U'QOOBATIK

verses.translation: spread over me Your graciousness, wrap me in Your covering,
verses.transliteration: WAB-SUT' A'LAY-YA T'AW-LAK WA JAL-LIL-NEE BISIT-RIK

verses.text: وَافْعَلْ بِي فِعْلَ عَزِيز تَضَرَّع إلَيْهِ عَبْدٌ ذَلِيلٌ فَرَحِمَهُ
verses.translation: and do with me what is done by a mighty man, when a lowly slave pleads to him and he shows him mercy,
verses.transliteration: WAF-A'L BEE FIA'-L A'ZEEZIN TAZ''AR-RAA' ILAY-HEE A'B-DUN D'ALEELUN FARAH'IMAH

verses.text: أَوْ غَنِيٍّ تَعَرَّضَ لَهُ عَبْدٌ فَقِيرٌ فَنَعَشَهُ
verses.translation: or a rich man, when a poor slave submits himself and he raises him to wealth!
verses.transliteration: AW GHANEE-YIN TAA'R-RAZ''A LAHOO A'B-DUN FAQEERUN FANAA'SHAH

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ لاَ خَفِيرَ لِي مِنْكَ فَلْيَخْفُرْنِيْ عِزُّكَ
verses.translation: O God, I have no protector against You, so let Your might be my protector!
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA LAA KHAFEERA LEE MINK FAL-YAKH-FUR-NEE I'Z-ZUK

verses.text: وَلا شَفِيعَ لِيْ إلَيْكَ فَلْيَشْفَعْ لِي فَضْلُكَ
verses.translation: I have no intercessor with You, so let Your bounty be my intercessor!
verses.transliteration: WALAA SHAFEEA' LEEE ILAY-KA FAL-YASH-FAA' LEE FAZ''-LUK

verses.translation: My offenses have set me quaking, so let Your pardon give me security!
verses.transliteration: WA QAD AW-JALAT-NEE KHAT'AAYAAYA FAL-YOO-MIN-NEE A'F-WUK

verses.text: فَمَا كُلُّ مَا نَطَقْتُ بِهِ عَنْ جَهْل مِنِّي بِسُوْءِ أَثَرِي
verses.translation: Not all that I have said rises up from my ignorance of my evil footsteps
verses.transliteration: FAMAA KUL-LU MAA NAT'AQ-TU BIHEE A'N- JAH-LIM-MIN-NEE BISOOO-I ATHAREE

verses.text: وَلاَ نِسيَان لِمَا سَبَقَ مِنْ ذَمِيمِ فِعْلِي
verses.translation: or forgetfulness of my blameworthy acts in the past,
verses.transliteration: WA LAA NIS-YAANIL-LIMAA SABAQA MIN D'AMEEMI FIA'-LEE

verses.translation: but in order that Your heaven and those within it

verses.text: وَأَرْضُكَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا مَا أَظْهَرْتُ لَكَ مِنَ النَّدَمِ
verses.translation: and Your earth and those upon it may hear the remorse which I have professed to You
verses.transliteration: WA AR-Z''UKA WAMAN A'LAY-HAA MAA AZ'-HAR-TU LAKA MINAN-NADAM

verses.translation: and the repentance through which I have sought asylum with You.

verses.text: فَلَعَـلَّ بَعْضَهُمْ بِرَحْمَتِكَ يَرْحَمُنِي لِسُوءِ مَوْقِفِي
verses.translation: Then perhaps one of them, through Your mercy, may show mercy upon my evil situation
verses.transliteration: FALAA'L-LA BAA'-Z''AHUM BIRAH'-MATIK YAR-H'AMUNEE LISOOO-I MAW-QIFEE

verses.text: أَوْ تُدْرِكُهُ الرِّقَّةُ عَلَىَّ لِسُوءِ حَالِي
verses.translation: or be seized by tenderness for my evil state.

verses.text: فَيَنَالَنِي مِنْهُ بِدَعْوَةٍ أَسْمَعُ لَدَيْكَ مِنْ دُعَائِي
verses.translation: There may come from him for my sake a supplication to which You give ear more than to my supplication
verses.transliteration: FAYANAALANEE MIN-H BIDAA'-WATIN HEEA AS-MAU' LADAY-KA MIN DUA'AA-EE

verses.text: أَوْ شَفَاعَـةٍ أَوْكَدُ عِنْدَكَ مِنْ شَفَاعَتِي
verses.translation: or an intercession surer with You than my intercession
verses.transliteration: AW SHAFAAA'TIN AW-KADU I'NDAKA MIN SHAFAAA'TEE

verses.text: تَكُونُ بِهَا نَجَاتِي مِنْ غَضَبِكَ وَفَوْزَتِي بِرضَاكَ
verses.translation: through which I may be delivered from Your wrath and attain to Your good pleasure!
verses.transliteration: TAKOONU BIHAA NAJAATEE MIN GHAZ''ABIK WA FAW-ZEE BIRIZ''AAK

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ إنْ يَكُنِ النَّدَمُ تَوْبَةً إلَيْكَ فَأَنَا أَنْدَمُ اْلنَّادِمِينَ
verses.translation: O God, if remorse is a repentance toward You, then I am the most remorseful of the remorseful!
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA EE-YAKUNIN-NADAMU TAW-BATAN ILAY-KA FAANAA ANDAMUN-NAADIMEEN

verses.text: وَإنْ يَكُنِ التَّرْكُ لِمَعْصِيَتِكَ إنَابَةً فَأَنَا أَوَّلُ الْمُنِيبينَ
verses.translation: If refraining from disobedience is a turning back to You, then I am the first of those who turn back!
verses.transliteration: WA EE-YAKUNIT-TAR-KU LIMAA'-S'EEATIKA INAABATAN FAANAA AW-WALUL-MUNEEBEEN

verses.text: وَإنْ يَكُنِ الاسْتِغْفَارُ حِطَّةً لِلذُّنُوبِ فَإنَي لَكَ مِنَ الْمُسْتَغْفِرِينَ
verses.translation: If praying for forgiveness alleviates sins, surely I am one of those who pray for Your forgiveness!
verses.transliteration: WA EE-YAK-NILIS-TIGH-FAARU H'IT'-T'ATAL-LILD'-D'UNOOBI FA IN-NEE ? LAKA MINAL-MUS-TAGH-FIREEN

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ فَكَمَا أَمَرْتَ بِالتَّوْبَةِ وَضَمِنْتَ الْقَبُولَ
verses.translation: O God, as You hast commanded repentance and guaranteed acceptance,
as You hast urged supplication, and promised to respond,

verses.text: فَصَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدِ وَآلِهِ وَاقْبَلْ تَوْبَتِي
verses.translation: so also bless Muhammad and his Household, accept my repentance,
verses.transliteration: FAS'AL-LI A'LAA MUH'AM-MADIW-WA AAALIH WAQ-BAL TAW-BATEE

verses.text: وَلاَ تَرْجِعْني مَرجَعَ الخَيبَةِ منْ رَحْمَتِك
verses.translation: and return me not to the returning place of disappointment in Your mercy!
Surely You art 'Ever-turning' [2:128] toward the sinners,
'All-compassionate' [2:128] toward the offenders who turn back!

verses.text: أللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّد وَآلِهِ كَمَا هَدَيْتَنَا بِهِ
verses.translation: O God, bless Muhammad and his Household just as You hast guided us by him!
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA S'AL-LI A'LAA MUH'AM-MADIW-WA AAALIHEE KAMAA HADAY-TANAA BIH

verses.text: وَصَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّد وَآلِهِ كَمَا اسْتَنْقَذْتَنَا بِهِ
verses.translation: Bless Muhammad and his Household just as You hast rescued us through him!
verses.transliteration: WA S'AL-LI A'LAA MUH'AM-MADIW-WA AAALIHEE KAMAS-TANQAD'-TANAA BIH

verses.translation: Bless Muhammad and his Household,

verses.text: صَلاَةً تَشْفَعُ لَنَا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَيَوْمَ الْفَاقَةِ إلَيْكَ
verses.translation: with a blessing that will intercede for us on the Day of Resurrection, the day of neediness toward You!
verses.transliteration: S'ALAATAN TASH-FAU' LANAA YAW-MAL-QEEAAMATI WAYAW-MAL-FAAQATI ILAY-K

verses.text: إنَّكَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْء قَدِيرٌ وَهُوَ عَلَيْكَ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: 'You are powerful over everything' [3:26], and that is easy for You!
verses.transliteration: IN-NAKA A'LAA KUL-LI SHAY-IN QADEER WA HUWA A'LAY-KA YASEER

verses.translation: O Lord of mighty prowess!
O Lord of mighty power!

verses.text: يَا عَزِيزُ يَا عَزِيزُ يَا عَزِيزُ
verses.translation: O Exalted in might! O Exalted in might! O Exalted in might!
Submissive to Your Almightiness are all of Your creatures;
so, (please) save me from the evil of Your creatures.
O All-liberal! O All-bountiful!
O Source of all bounties! O Doer of favors!

verses.text: يَا لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ انْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ
verses.translation: O He save Whom there is no god! All glory be to You!
verses.transliteration: YA LA ILAHA ILLA ANTA SUBHANAKA

verses.translation: Verily, I have been a wrongdoer.
So We heard his prayer and saved him from the anguish.
verses.transliteration: FASTAJABNA LAHU WA NAJJAYNAHU MIN ALGHAMMI

verses.translation: Thus do We save the believers.

verses.text: وَصَلَّىٰ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ ٱلطَّيِّبِينَ ٱلطَّاهِرِينَ
verses.translation: May Allah send blessings to Muhammad and his Household, the pure and immaculate.
verses.transliteration: WA SALLA ALLAHU `ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALIHI ALTTAYYIBINA ALTTAHIRINA

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي
verses.translation: Oh Allah! Make useful for me what You have taught me and teach me knowledge that will be useful to me.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INFA'NII BIMAA 'ALLAMTANII WA'ALLIMNII MAA YANFA'UUNII

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فَهْمَ النَّبِيِّينَ وَحِفْظَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ وَالْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! I ask You for the understanding of the prophets and the memory of the messengers, and those nearest to You.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INII AS'ALUKA FAHMAL-NABIYYEN WA HIFTHAL MURSALEEN AL-MUQARRABEEN

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِسَانِي عَامِرًا بِذِكْرِكَ وَقَلْبِي بِخَشْيَتِكَ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! Make my tongue full of Your remembrance and my heart with consciousness of You.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA IJ'AL LISANEE 'AMIRAN BI DHIKRIKA WA QALBI BI KHASHYATIKA

verses.text: إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ مَا تَشَاءُ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنْتَ حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! You do whatever You wish, and You are my Availer and Protector and the best of aid.
verses.transliteration: INNAKA 'ALA MA-TASHA'U QADEER WA ANTA HASBUNA-ALLAHU WA NI'MAL WAKEEL

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا
verses.translation: Oh Allah! Nothing is easy except what You have made easy.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA LA SAHLA ILLAMA JA-‘ALTAHU SAHLA

verses.translation: If You wish, You can make the difficult easy.
verses.transliteration: TAJ‘ALU AL HAZANA ETHA MA SHI’TA SAHLA

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ مَا قَرَأْتُ وَمَا حَفِظْتُ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! I entrust You with what I have read and I have studied.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI ASTAODI'UKA MA QARA'TU WAMA HAFATH-TU

verses.translation: Oh Allah! Bring it back to me when I am in need of it.

verses.text: إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ مَا تَشَاءُ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنْتَ حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! You do whatever You wish, You are my Availer and Protector and the best of aid.
verses.transliteration: INNAKA 'ALA MA-TASHA'-U QADEER WA ANTA HASBUNA ALLAH WA NI'MAL WAKEEL
